thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Domtar Corp Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.64

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Domtar Corp Posts Q4 Adj. Earnings Per Share $0.64
text:
Feb 8 (Reuters) - Domtar Corp:
* ORATION REPORTS PRELIMINARY FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS; ANNOUNCES INCREASE TO ITS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND
* Q4 LOSS PER SHARE $5.42 * Q4 SALES $1.3 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.64 EXCLUDING ITEMS * IN QUARTER, DEFERRED TAX BENEFIT OF $186 MILLION RELATED TO U.S. TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT OF 2017
* NON-CASH GOODWILL IMPAIRMENT CHARGE ASSOCIATED WITH PERSONAL CARE OF $578 MILLION ($573 MILLION AFTER TAX) IN QUARTER
* ‍IN 2018, COSTS, INCLUDING FREIGHT, LABOR AND RAW MATERIALS, ARE EXPECTED TO MARGINALLY INCREASE​
* BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVED A 4.8% INCREASE TO ITS QUARTERLY DIVIDEND (FROM $0.415 PER SHARE TO $0.435 PER SHARE) ON ITS COMMON STOCK
* Q4 REVENUE VIEW $1.31 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.81 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
